executive_summary:
## Executive Summary - Cityview Family Dental Clinic

**Annual Savings Opportunity:** $42,960
**Digital Health Score:** 6.4/10
**Priority Issues:** 1

**Top 3 Opportunities:**
1. High-Impact Ad Spend Optimization - $38,400/ano em savings potenciais
2. Comprehensive Digital Optimization - Combined ROI 40-60% superior a initiatives isoladas

insights.details: Analysis based on calculated spend of $4,500/month. Conservative savings estimate.
recommendations: License utilization review: Identify inactive users and downgrade
Annual vs monthly billing switch (typical 10-20% savings)
Feature audit: Ensure you're not paying for unused premium features

business_impact.impact_description: Moderate performance issues affecting user experience

insights.details: Estimated performance analysis (PageSpeed API not available). Recommendations based on common performance issues.
recommendations: PRIORITY: Fix Core Web Vitals - LCP, FID, CLS
Implement lazy loading for images and videos
Optimize server response time - consider CDN
Remove render-blocking resources
Compress and minify all assets
Note: Get Google PageSpeed API key for detailed performance analysis
Manual performance audit recommended for accurate insights
HIGH PRIORITY: CPA $200 - Pause bottom 20% performing keywords
Implement negative keyword strategy to reduce wasted spend
Optimize landing page relevance - ensure message match with ads
Note: Connect Google Ads API for real-time campaign data
insights.details: Estimated Ad Analysis (API not connected): Spend=$8,000, CPA=$200.00

recommendations: HIGH PRIORITY: Meta CPA $100 - Optimize audience targeting
Test different creative formats (video vs image vs carousel)
Implement lookalike audiences based on best customers
CTR 1.00% indicates poor ad relevance - Creative refresh needed
Test different ad copy angles and value propositions
Update visuals to be more engaging and scroll-stopping
Note: Connect Meta Business API for real-time campaign data
insights.details: Estimated Meta Analysis (API not connected): Spend=$6,000, CPA=$100.00

missed_opportunities.description: CPA de $200 está 40% acima do benchmark da indústria ($120)
missed_opportunities.action: Reestruturar campaign targeting, implementar negative keywords, otimizar landing pages
missed_opportunities.sales_angle: Redução imediata de waste em ads - savings mensal de $3,200

missed_opportunities.description: Company tem ad spend + website performance issues = oportunidade full-stack optimization
missed_opportunities.action: Propor package: Ad optimization + website performance + conversion rate optimization
missed_opportunities.roi_estimate: Combined ROI 40-60% superior a initiatives isoladas
missed_opportunities.sales_angle: Holistic approach - ads são waste se website não converte

actions: Reestruturar campaign targeting, implementar negative keywords, otimizar landing pages
Propor package: Ad optimization + website performance + conversion rate optimization
